column5: Hey Randy, I heard a hook tipped with a hot-dog on a slip float will help you win that tourney in Balsam Lake  Good Luck!!!
Senkos for LM. Tubes for SM and big Spinner baits or buck tails for Musky.
This bait works great for me for muskies every time I go to Balsam. Except for the yapping. Make sure the dog sweater is firetiger coloured.
At that time of year you really shouldn't need to drop the spinnerbait rod.
That's genious.  I wanna t-shirt!  pattent pending.  PATTENT PENDING!!  LOL HD
French poodle with white/firetiger on a big siwash hook..... Ok, sounds good I'll give it a try and let you guys know how it works!! Thanks for the input!
